settings.question: Digestive Health Supplements for Healing & Weight Loss
settings.answer_body1: We have a great range of high-quality probiotics and herbal digestive enzymes, which have been selected for their gut healing capabilities and industry-leading support for digestive health. At Well Well Well we’ve made it easy for you to find the very best digestive enzyme and probiotic supplement for your needs in Canada and worldwide.

settings.question: What are the benefits of digestive enzyme supplements and probiotics for digestive health?
settings.answer_body1: The benefits of supplements for digestive enzyme healing and health have been formulated to help your body’s digestive system function properly. Whether you need the benefits of a probiotic to help the balance of the good or friendly bacteria in your digestive system or a wide range of digestive aids for bloating or even lactose intolerance, we are your one stop shop.

settings.question: Are all plant based digestive enzymes and probiotics vegan friendly?
settings.answer_body1: You will find a wide choice of organic plant based and vegan digestive enzyme supplements and organic and vegan plant based probiotic digestive supplements in our store. All of these digestive supplements are made with high-quality or organic ingredients and are certified to be toxin and allergen free.

settings.question: How do organic digestive aid supplements help boost the immune system and help healing?
settings.answer_body1: Several studies have indicated that probiotic and digestive aid supplements can be beneficial for digestive healing by supporting the immune system and helping your body to fight infection more easily. With the aid of natural and organic digestive enzyme and probiotics supplements, your digestive system is better equipped to digest and absorb the needed nutrients for your overall health and ultimately creating the most optimal environment for your immune system to function at its best.

settings.question: Can digestive enzyme supplements and probiotics be taken for weight loss?
settings.answer_body1: Probiotics and herbal digestive enzymes can be helpful for weight loss, with a healthy diet and regular exercise. When you have a healthy gut, you are better able to digest your food with higher absorption of nutrients. Good digestion also allows for regular bowel movements, which can lead to weight loss. You can find high quality digestive enzymes and probiotic supplements in Canada and worldwide, Well Well Well is your trusted source.

settings.question: Testing
settings.answer_body1:
Pre & post natal vitamins & supplements which make up a large part
of our natural pregnancy products  selection, can be essential in
helping mother and child in general wellbeing and preventing vitamin
deficiencies. Commonly recommended best products for pregnancy are the
combination of folic acid and vitamin B1, that work synergistically for
fetal development such as cell division and the formation of the myelin
sheath or nerve covering. Another benefit is that they also prevent the
buildup of homocysteine, a toxic by-product of protein metabolism that
has been associated with birth defects.

Iron
is also another important factor in a baby’s development. Many of the
best natural prenatal vitamins, multivitamins & supplements also
contain iron which helps to increase blood production for the baby. But
it is important to consult a healthcare practitioner when dealing with
all natural pregnancy products. We carry a number of different mom and
baby care products such as lactation teas for healthy milk production
for the mother. The benefits are numerous when it comes to mom and baby
care products at Well Well Well. Research has shown from a 1998 study,
that a child’s risk for developing a brain tumour decreased in
connection to the number of trimesters the mother took Prenatal
multivitamin supplements during pregnancy. At Well Well Well, we also
carry a number of quality baby and kids supplements to help with your
child’s development and health.

Another
very important aspect for new mothers is natural skin care during
pregnancy. Making sure that skin care products are clean and non-toxic
for the mother is imperative in maintaining skin health during
pregnancy.

settings.question: Are Digestive Supplements Safe to Take?
settings.answer_body1: All of the digestive enzyme supplements and probiotics that we stock conform with Canada’s health regulations and have been extensively tested before being made available for sale. However, we always recommend that you talk to a doctor if you have any concerns.

settings.question: When Should You Take Digestive Enzymes?
settings.answer_body1: The best time for you to take supplements that contain digestive enzymes, whether you are taking plant based digestive enzyme supplements or those that are made with animal products, is just before you eat or in the middle of a meal.

settings.question: What Is the Difference Between Probiotics and Digestive Enzymes?
settings.answer_body1: Both probiotics and digestive enzymes aid digestion but while enzymes only have one job – to break down food molecules into their component parts so the body can use them effectively - probiotics perform several functions, including fighting bad bacteria and encouraging the production of digestive enzymes.
